count_per_folder.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'voice_message' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit([doc.source_id, doc.metadata.folder], 1); }

listing_by_mailbox.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'voice_message' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.source_id, {'_id': doc._id, 'name': doc.name, 'caller_id_number': doc.metadata.caller_id_number}); }
